text: Here comes the bride! Emily Ratajkowski surprised us on Friday, February 23, when she shared on social media that she had just married her new boyfriend, Sebastian Bear - McClard. The 26 - year - old model and her producer beau tied the knot at a courthouse in New York City, where she forewent a traditional wedding dress in favor of a cute ‘ 70s - inspired pantsuit from Zara that rings in at just $ 200.
